code: import{useEffect,useRef}from"react";export default function Usetitle(_ref){var description=_ref.description,title=_ref.title;var prevTitle=useRef(document.title);var prevDescription=useRef(document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]').getAttribute("content"));useEffect(function(){var previusTitle=prevTitle.current;if(title){document.title="".concat(title," | Bogota");}return function(){return document.title=previusTitle;};},[title]);useEffect(function(){var metaDescription=document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]');var previusDescription=prevDescription.current;if(description){metaDescription.setAttribute("content",description);}return function(){return metaDescription.setAttribute("content",previusDescription);};},[description]);}
